name: Blade User
description:
Set off on your journey across a fantasy world, filled with danger. 
Will you be a savior to the people or will you become the villain?

This game was made for Driftwood Gaming's Quarter Annual Jam v2.
I used the theme "Become the villain" with a bit of "First contact". I was also disappointed "Bakery" wasn't chosen as a theme, so I put that in too. 
The basic gameplay is inspired by the first RPG game I ever played, Miracle Warriors, on the Sega Master System, but I've also added my own unique flair to it.

WARNING: The game contains flashing lights and images, and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. 

The game also contains violence and mature themes and is not suitable for younger players. 

Known bugs:

After a cutscene in the final dungeon, the screen will go black and transfer you to the world map, but if you move up and around a bit to trigger a random battle, it should fix it and allow you to finish.

The Life Belt is broken, instead of gaining extra HP it lowers HP to 10% of max, avoid equipping for now.
